name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker leveraged a command and scripting interpreter to execute malicious scripts on a compromised host. The workflow includes killing malicious scripts, quarantining affected files, blocking malicious IPs, and scanning for malware.

action--a1c8f451-fc3f-4f8a-ab8c-82a4e09f.name: Kill malicious script
action--a1c8f451-fc3f-4f8a-ab8c-82a4e09f.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious PowerShell script.

if-condition--d8a8ef9c-bb0a-42c4-af7a-0b.name: Check if malicious script is found

action--d8a8ef9c-bb0a-42c4-af7a-0b3245d3.name: Quarantine affected files
action--d8a8ef9c-bb0a-42c4-af7a-0b3245d3.description: Move the malicious script to quarantine.

action--63b24efc-30c4-419c-afe1-7b89e2d4.name: Review command logs
action--63b24efc-30c4-419c-afe1-7b89e2d4.description: Review the command execution logs for malicious activities.

while-condition--loop-log-review.name: Review logs loop
while-condition--loop-log-review.description: Loop until all logs are reviewed.

action--c70d42c4-ab75-401d-a438-937c8741.name: Block malicious IP
action--c70d42c4-ab75-401d-a438-937c8741.description: Block outbound connections to the identified malicious IP address.

action--52baf483-0eb8-4914-a0fc-00f4f20e.name: Run endpoint scan
action--52baf483-0eb8-4914-a0fc-00f4f20e.description: Run a security scan on the user profile directory.
